amendment.description: An amendment numbered 86 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funding for Public Land Order No. 7923, relating to public lands withdrawal surrounding Chaco Culture National Historical Park boundary.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit funding for Public Land Order No. 7923, relating to public lands withdrawal surrounding Chaco Culture National Historical Park boundary.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crane amendment (A038) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 219 (Roll no. 580).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Crane amendment (A038) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 219 (Roll no. 580).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
